channel.title: Fixes/Tutorials
channel.description: Fixes and Tutorials for the Decimation Mod

item.title: How to Fix: I am getting Kicked by Anticheat
item.author: invalid@example.com (ScottehBoeh)
item.dc:creator: ScottehBoeh
item.content:encoded:
How to Fix: I am getting Kicked by Anticheat
This issue occurs when attempting to join an Official Server, or a community server that has Anticheat enabled. If you are 100% sure that you do not have any hacked clients or game-tampering modifications installed (except for Optifine) then the following fixes may help:

  • Possible Reason: You have other mods in your /mods/ folder. This means that Decimation has detected other mods installed on your game and therefore...

How to Fix: I am getting Kicked by Anticheat

item.title: How to Fix: Game not Starting Properly after I Update!
item.author: invalid@example.com (ScottehBoeh)
item.dc:creator: ScottehBoeh
item.content:encoded:
How to Fix: Game not Starting Properly after Update:
This is an issue that occurs after updating your game and restarting it. This can happen due to several different reasons:

  • Possible Reason: You are using a 1.7.10 folder inside of your /mods/ folder. Sadly, the mod does not support this, meaning that you'll have to use the normal /mods/ folder without a 1.7.10 folder.
    âœ… How to Fix: Perform a clean...

How to Fix: Game not Starting Properly after I Update!

item.title: Permission Nodes: All Command Permission Nodes
item.author: invalid@example.com (ScottehBoeh)
item.dc:creator: ScottehBoeh
item.content:encoded:
Permission Nodes

The following list contains all required Decimation permission nodes for those who are running servers with GroupManager or PermissionsEx. Note that these commands can be bypassed for opped players.

  • Bottlecaps Commands (/caps give)
    • - net.decimation.mod.common.common_commands.Command_BottleCaps

  • Clan Commands (/clan create, disband, invite etc)
    • - net.decimation.mod.server.clans.ClanCommands
    ...

Permission Nodes: All Command Permission Nodes

item.title: How to Fix: Unable to Spawn Traders!
item.author: invalid@example.com (ScottehBoeh)
item.dc:creator: ScottehBoeh
item.content:encoded:
How to Fix: Unable to Spawn Traders:
This is a common issue that many server owners have when they are unable to use the specified /trader commands to spawn traders onto their Server/World. Here are some potential fixes:

  • Your WorldGuard region has mob-spawning disabled. This is the most common reason that traders are not spawning on your Map. If your WorldGuard region has mob-spawning disabled, this means that any traders within said region are unable to spawn as...

How to Fix: Unable to Spawn Traders!

item.title: How to Fix: Game Crashing when joining a World/Server
item.author: invalid@example.com (ScottehBoeh)
item.dc:creator: ScottehBoeh
item.content:encoded:
How to Fix: Game Crashing when joining a World/Server:
There are many specific reasons that could cause your game to crash when attempting to join a World/Server. Here are a few possible fixes for this issue that you may find useful:

  • Possible Reason: Your game is attempting to load an invalid version of the Minecraft options.txt file. This can occur if you're attempting to play the mod using the default minecraft launcher. If you have played a minecraft session 1.8+...

How to Fix: Game Crashing when joining a World/Server
